data.title: Hanoverian to Windsor Consorts: Power, Influence, and Dynasty 3031128281, 9783031128288
data.meta_description: This book examines the lives and tenures of the consorts of the Hanoverian, Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, and Windsor monarchs...
